actions.message:
${member}, Here

**User commands**
```
+Help - this message

+Ammo - ammo chart

+Binfo - gives info about the bot

+Ammo+ - ammo list and how to use it

+(Ammo_Type) from list to see it use "+ammo+"

+Maps - see a list of map commands copy the map you want to see
```
You need a role named "ammo" to use. Can only be used in a server not in the bot's DM's
`+Send (@user)` - Sends that user the help command/bot info
`+Senda (@user)` - Sends the ammo chart to the user you ping

**Admin commands**
```
+Role (@user) - Adds the "ammo" role to a user & let's that user use "+send" & "+senda"
you will need to add a role named "ammo" for the commands to work!
+ammorole-info - Tells you about why setup is there and how to use "+Send & +Senda" without giving the bot Permissions to "manage roles"
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Hey I'm Ballistics homie, I'm here to make it easy for you to find all the ammo info you will need in the world of Escape From Tarkov.
See you soon pmc - ${member}
Do "+help" for commands thanks everyone for your time.
All commands work in DM's if it does not it will not send anything to see if the bot is online DM "+ping" to the bot
The bot now has a github.
Link: https://github.com/ThatOneLoner/Escape-From-Tarkov-Ballistics-discordbot

actions.message:
Hey I'm Ballistics homie, I'm here to make it easy for you to find all the ammo info you will need in the world of escape from tarkov.
see you soon pmc - ${member}
do "+help" for commands thanks everyone for your time
all commands work in dm's if it does not it will give you an error message

**help message below**

```
+help - this message

+ammo - ammo chart

+binfo - gives info about the bot

+ammo+ - ammo list and how to use it

+(ammo_type) from list to see it use "+ammo+"
```
you need "ammo" role to use (can only be used in a server not in the bot's dms)
`+send (@user)` - sends that user the help command / bot info
`+senda (@user)` - sends the ammo chart to the (@user)

admin commands

```
+role (@user) - adds the "ammo" role to a user & let's that user use "+send" & "+senda"
+setup - adds the ammo role to the server (role is only there so "+send" & "+senda" the bot will say who used it so it can be reported and all u have to do is take the ammo role from that user

+setupinfo - tells u about why setup is there


who sent you the message: ${member} help/bot info message sent to you by ${member}

(report if someone is spaming the command to the servers admins)

actions.message:
Maps maybe outdated go to discord.gg/sherpahub
To see the maps that are always updated if you see a map that is not updated DM's "That One Loner#8226" and say what map it is that is outdated and I will update it.
Thanks for your help PMC's
```
+factory
+customs
+woods
+shoreline
+interchange
+reserve
+lighthouse
+labs
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Setup adds "ammo" role to the server below is why it is there and how to added it with out needing to give the bot "manage roles"
the role. Has no permissions and makes it so those who have it can do "+send" & "+senda" so give it to those that help and the bot says who sent the command so if it spammed that user can report it to the. Admins on the server,
just add a role named = "ammo" 
if u don't want to give the bot Permissions to "manage roles"

actions.message:
```
+Help                      Lists available commands
+Kick [@user] [reason]     Kicks the mentioned user
+Ban [@user] [reason]      Bans the mentioned user
+Mute [@user]              Mutes the mentioned user
+Unmute [@user]            Unmutes the mentioned user
+DeleteChannel [#channel]  Deletes the mentioned channel
+DeleteRole [@role]     Deletes the mentioned role
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
```
Please mention one user in order to kick them!
!Kick [@user] [reason]
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
```
Please mention one user in order to ban them!
!Ban [@user] [reason]
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
```
Please mention one user in order to mute them!
!Mute [@user]
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
```
Please mention one user in order to unmute them!
!Unmute [@user]
```
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
```
Please mention one channel in order to delete it!
!DeleteChannel [#channel]
```
